features.name: Pikachu
features.description: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.description: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Pikachu.

features.name: Charizard
features.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

ability.name: Energy Burn
ability.description: As often as you like during your turn, you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn.

features.name: Blastoise
features.description: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

ability.name: Rain Dance
ability.description: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Water Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.description: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost.
